## Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. # K 4 POWER CONTROL FLEX ## Text Für mehr Kontrolle: Der K 4 Power Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole ist für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet. ## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer. It features a compact design with a handle on top for easy portability. The pressure washer has two wheels at the back for mobility. Attached to the front is a hose reel for convenient storage of the hose. In front of the pressure washer, there are two different spray lances. One lance has a more streamlined design, while the other has a wider nozzle, likely for different spray patterns or intensities. The pressure washer is designed for tasks such as cleaning driveways, patios, and vehicles. The brand name is visible on the body of the pressure washer, indicating it is a product from a well-known manufacturer. The overall design suggests a focus on user-friendliness and efficiency. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.324-300.0 ## Text Content - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529122599
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,8
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 11,9
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 14,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584
### Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 160 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [ ]
Dreckfräser [ ]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [ ]
HD-Schlauch m / PremiumFlex
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [ ]
Reinigungsmittel-einsatz über Plug 'n' Clean-System
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Wassergekühlter Motor [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [ ]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [ ]
## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, large number "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping this number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, there is black text that reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND** This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance online market. The design uses contrasting colors to draw attention, with the yellow background highlighting the text against the gray number. ## Description The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with the European Union (EU) flag design. The EU flag consists of a circle of 12 gold stars on a blue background. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. The logo suggests that the product or item is manufactured within Europe, indicating compliance with European standards or origin. ## Description The image is a circular icon featuring a hand holding a test tube. The test tube is vertically oriented and contains the numbers "3", "2", and "1" stacked from top to bottom. The background of the icon is teal, and the hand and test tube are white, creating a contrast that highlights the central image. The numbers inside the test tube are also white, matching the color of the hand. This icon likely represents a countdown or sequence related to testing or measurement. ## Description The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a lightning bolt striking a circular object, possibly representing power or energy. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall theme suggests an emphasis on energy or power enhancement.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## Text

Für mehr Kontrolle: Der K 4 Power Control Flex mit PremiumFlex-Schlauch und G 160 Q Power Control-Pistole ist für mittelstarke Verschmutzungen auf Terrassen, Gartenmöbeln und Autos geeignet.

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer. It features a compact design with a handle on top for easy portability. The pressure washer has two wheels at the back for mobility. Attached to the front is a hose reel for convenient storage of the hose. 

In front of the pressure washer, there are two different spray lances. One lance has a more streamlined design, while the other has a wider nozzle, likely for different spray patterns or intensities. The pressure washer is designed for tasks such as cleaning driveways, patios, and vehicles. 

The brand name is visible on the body of the pressure washer, indicating it is a product from a well-known manufacturer. The overall design suggests a focus on user-friendliness and efficiency.

## Text Content

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Besonders leistungsfähiger wassergekühlter Motor

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529122599
Stromart V / Hz 230 / 50
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 130 / 2 - max. 13
Fördermenge l/h max. 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1,8
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 11,9
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 14,8
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 405 × 306 × 584

### Ausstattung
Hochdruckpistole G 160 Q Power Control
Vario Power Jet [ ]
Dreckfräser [ ]
Integriertes Aufbewahrungsnetz [ ]

Wassergekühlter Motor [ ]

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, large number "1" in a light gray color on the left side. Overlapping this number is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, there is black text that reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND**

This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance online market. The design uses contrasting colors to draw attention, with the yellow background highlighting the text against the gray number.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring a blue geometric shape with the European Union (EU) flag design. The EU flag consists of a circle of 12 gold stars on a blue background. Below the shape, the text "Made in Europe" is written. The logo suggests that the product or item is manufactured within Europe, indicating compliance with European standards or origin.

## Description

The image is a circular icon featuring a hand holding a test tube. The test tube is vertically oriented and contains the numbers "3", "2", and "1" stacked from top to bottom. The background of the icon is teal, and the hand and test tube are white, creating a contrast that highlights the central image. The numbers inside the test tube are also white, matching the color of the hand. This icon likely represents a countdown or sequence related to testing or measurement.

## Description

The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a lightning bolt striking a circular object, possibly representing power or energy. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The overall theme suggests an emphasis on energy or power enhancement.
